error.http_not_found: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
error.access_denied: You do not have permission to access.
error.bad_request: The request you made is invalid. Please check the entered data.
error.conflict: There is a conflict with the current request. Please try again.
error.gone: The resource you are trying to access is no longer available.
error.length_required: The request requires a content length. Please include the content length.
error.locked: The resource you are trying to access is currently locked.
error.method_not_allowed: The request method is not allowed. Please check the correct method.
error.not_acceptable: The requested content is not acceptable. Please check the content type.
error.precondition_failed: The preconditions for the request failed. Please check the conditions.
error.precondition_required: The request requires preconditions. Please check the required conditions.
error.service_unavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
error.too_many_requests: Too many requests have been made in a short time. Please wait and try again later.
error.unauthorized: You need to log in to access this page.
error.unprocessable_entity: The request cannot be processed. Please check the entered data.
error.unsupported_media_type: The media type is unsupported. Please check the supported media type.
error.expired_token: Your token has expired. Please log in again.
error.not_logged_in: You are not logged in, Please login to get access to this route.
error.user_no_longer_exists: The user that belongs to this token does no longer exist.
error.password_changed: User recently changed his password. Please login again.
error.access_denied_route: You are not allowed to access this route.

validation.user_name_too_short: User name is too short, it must be at least 3 characters
validation.email_already_in_use: This email is already in use
validation.password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.current_password_required: You must enter your current password
validation.no_user_found_for_id: No user found for this ID
validation.incorrect_current_password: The current password you entered is incorrect
validation.invalid_phone_number: Invalid phone number. Only Egyptian and Saudi numbers are accepted
